item.title: Bingo Blitz Codes (June 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Bingo Blitz Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Bingo Blitz
  • How to Get More Bingo Blitz Codes

Bingo Blitz is a popular online game that combines classic bingo with exciting power-ups, quests, and other features. Here, you need to be as fast and attentive as possible to not miss the bingo and win before someone else does.

If you are low on currency, which often happens to beginners, you can use Bingo Blitz codes. The rewards from the codes will be both precious currency and other useful bonuses or power-ups, so don't neglect them.

Updated June 29, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are no active codes for Bingo Blitz at the moment. You won’t find any new rewards to claim right now, but that could change soon. We’re keeping an eye out for fresh codes and will update this guide as soon as they appear. Feel free to check back later to see what’s been added.

All Bingo Blitz Codes

Working Bingo Blitz Codes

At the moment, there are no working Bingo Blitz codes. To stay tuned, save this page and visit it later.

Expired Bingo Blitz Codes

  • BALLON3
  • BLITZYTT
  • BBGC2
  • CLUE1
  • DREWNEW
  • FBGIFT4U
  • FISHY
  • FLAG
  • GRATEFUL
  • HUNT
  • ice
  • NowThatsBingo
  • PLAYNOW
  • PUMPKINPRANK
  • QUEST
  • RESCUE
  • SPOON
  • TWITTERFIRSTGIFT
  • WHITE

If you are an avid gambler or a beginner, you probably experienced situations when you spent all the currency and couldn't play anymore. Don't worry because by redeeming the codes, you can change this and, moreover, in addition to currency, get other useful rewards, so be sure to take advantage of this opportunity.

How to Redeem Codes for Bingo Blitz

Redeeming Bingo Blitz is not difficult, and will take you a few clicks. However, since it is a mobile game, you will need to complete the tutorial before you can access the redemption option, which will take about 10–15 minutes. Once that's done, follow these steps to redeem the codes:

  • Launch Bingo Blitz .
  • Go to the main menu. Here, pay attention to the upper-right corner of the screen. There will be a hamburger button. Click on it.
  • This will open a side menu with a list of different options. Among them, interact with the fourth one which says Promo Code.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a Redeem button below it. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Bingo Blitz Codes

Just like with Roblox codes, you can find more codes on the game's official social media, and luckily, Bingo Blitz has plenty of them. By keeping a close eye on each of them, you will likely find fresh codes.

  • Official Bingo Blitz X account.
  • Official Bingo Blitz Facebook page.
  • Official Bingo Blitz YouTube channel.
  • Official Bingo Blitz Instagram account.

Bingo Blitz is available on mobile devices.

item.title: Roblox: Project Blue Lock Codes (June 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Project Blue Lock Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Project Blue Lock
  • How to Get More Project Blue Lock Codes

Project Blue Lock is an addictive soccer simulator where you can train and play against others to prove your skills. This Roblox experience offers intense and action-packed matches, for which you need to be prepared not only by playing well, but also by compiling a good build from the various abilities you have acquired.

Redeeming Project Blue Lock codes will give you a great opportunity to roll for new abilities, as it will reward you with a bunch of Spins. So, if you have just started playing or are not satisfied with your build, codes are exactly what you need.

Updated June 29, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Several new codes have just been added for Project Blue Lock , and they all offer Spins. These rewards can give you a boost as you refine your character and progress through the game. If you’ve already claimed earlier codes, now’s a good time to grab the latest ones. More updates could bring even more rewards, so don’t forget to check back later.

All Project Blue Lock Codes

Working Project Blue Lock Codes

  • AIKUUPDATE - Redeem this code to get Spins. (NEW)
  • COBRATERRITORY - Redeem this code to get Spins. (NEW)
  • SNAKECOIL - Redeem this code to get Spins. (NEW)
  • MOREFOLLOWERS - Redeem this code to get Spins. (NEW)

Expired Project Blue Lock Codes

  • REOUPDATE - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • CHAMELEON - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • DEFENSEKING2 - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • 1KFOLLOWERS - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • NIKOUPDATE - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • FOOTBALLSENSOR - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • DEFENSEKING - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • TWITTERANALYST - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • TWITTERKING? - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • KINGUPDATE - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • THEKINGISHERE - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • BAROU - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • LAVINHOUPDATE - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • THEDANCER - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • WORLDCLASS - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • BRAZIL - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • PITY - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • LASTLUCK - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • DEMONKING - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • PUZZLE - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • FERNYPLS - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • NELISAGI - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • OREWAEGOIST - Redeem this code to get Spins.
  • URWELCOME - Redeem this code to get 30 Spins.
  • LUCKYRIN - Redeem this code to get 3 Lucky Spins.
  • MELRIN - Redeem this code to get 20 Spins.
  • EGOISTA - Redeem this code to get 10 Spins.
  • QUARESMA - Redeem this code to get 2 Lucky Spins.
  • 3MVISITS - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • 3MHURRAY - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • THANKSFOR15K - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • ACE-EATER - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • DONLORENZO - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.
  • FREECODE?? - Redeem this code to get in-game rewards.

Since powerful abilities are rare, you'll need a lot of Spins, which are not easy to get. Redeeming codes is one of the best sources of Spins farming, so don't neglect it and take advantage of them while they are active.

How to Redeem Codes for Project Blue Lock

It won't take you long to redeem codes in Project Blue Lock , especially if you've done it before in other Roblox experiences. To simplify the task even further, use our guide to find out how to redeem rewards:

  • Launch Project Blue Lock .
  • Pay attention to the bottom of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in a row. Among them, interact with the last one, which says Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a blue Redeem button below it. Now, copy and paste one of the working codes from the list above into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the blue Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a “Success” notification in the lower right part of the screen, and the rewards will be credited to your account.

How to Get More Project Blue Lock Codes

You can find all the necessary information about updates, announcements, and Roblox codes on the game's official social media pages. So, not to miss out on freebies, visit these resources and carefully monitor them for new codes:

  • Official Project Blue Lock Roblox group.
  • Official Project Blue Lock Discord server.

item.title: Roblox: Fire Force Reignition Codes (June 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Fire Force Reignition Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Fire Force Reignition
  • How to Get More Fire Force Reignition Codes

Fire Force Reignition is an adventure RPG where you will have to travel around the open world, kill enemies, and constantly improve your character. As in similar Roblox experiences, a lot depends on your build, which consists not only of armor and weapons but also a bunch of different abilities and upgrade trees.

By redeeming Fire Force Reignition codes, you will get a great opportunity to improve your position in the game by getting different rerolls for your abilities. Hurry up, because codes have a certain expiration date, after which they become invalid and do not offer rewards.

Updated June 29, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Several codes are currently available for Fire Force Reignition , and they all offer reroll tokens to help you make changes in your setup. One of the codes also grants an ability reroll for more variety. Keep checking this guide in case additional rewards are added in the future.

All Fire Force Reignition Codes

Working Fire Force Reignition Codes

  • PREUPDATECODE3 - Redeem this code to get Reroll Tokens. (NEW)
  • PREUPDATECODE1 - Redeem this code to get Reroll Tokens.
  • PREUPDATECODE2 - Redeem this code to get Reroll Tokens.
  • STEALANANIMEPLAYERS - Redeem this code to get Reroll Tokens.
  • MINORPATCH - Redeem this code to get Reroll Tokens.
  • BREAKINGBARRIERS - Redeem this code to get Reroll Tokens.
  • MBALL - Redeem this code to get 1 Ability Reroll.
  • SUPERPATCH - Redeem this code to get Reroll Tokens.

Expired Fire Force Reignition Codes

  • MOMMY - Redeem this code to get Reroll Tokens.
  • FOOL - Redeem this code to get Reroll Tokens.
  • REIGNITION2 - Redeem this code to get one Ability Reroll, 100 Reroll Tokens, and one Generation Reroll.
  • 55KLIKES - Redeem this code to get Reroll Tokens.
  • REIGNITION - Redeem this code to get four Ability Rerolls, 100 Reroll Tokens, and two Generation Rerolls.

Redeeming Fire Force Reignition codes will be useful at every stage of the game. So, no matter if you are a beginner or an advanced player, don't neglect it and be sure to take advantage of the opportunity to get some freebies.

How to Redeem Codes for Fire Force Reignition

Redeeming Fire Force Reignition codes is a little more difficult than in other Roblox games, but this is only because it is not clear how to find the right option. If you also still don't understand how it works, don't worry because we have prepared a step-by-step guide:

  • Launch Fire Force Reignition and log in to the server.
  • Press the M key to open the menu.
  • Among the buttons listed, interact with the first one, with the gear icon.
  • This will open the Settings menu. At the bottom of the menu, you'll see a small redemption section consisting of an input field and a green Go button next to it. Now, copy and paste one of the active codes in the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the green Go button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Fire Force Reignition Codes

To find more Fire Force Reignition codes, you will only need to visit the game's official pages on social media. The game's developers often share new Roblox codes, so if you are careful enough, you can easily find them among other content:

  • Official Fire Force Reignition Roblox group.
  • Official Fire Force Reignition Discord server.
Roblox

item.title: Star Trek Fleet Command Codes (June 2025)
item.description:
Star Trek Fleet Command is an interesting and content-packed game inspired by the iconic Star Trek series. You play the role of a spaceship captain and lead the development of an empire. Your responsibilities will include collecting materials for the construction of new structures, participating in the war against the invaders, and much more, which will take a lot of time and resources. Luckily, you can redeem Star Trek Fleet Command Codes to get cool gifts from the developers that will definitely come in handy during your travels or development.

Updated June 29, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Star Trek Fleet Command offers a wide range of codes that reward you with everything from character shards to powerful in-game resources. Some of these codes require reaching specific Ops levels to redeem, so newer players may need to progress further before claiming certain rewards. Keep checking back regularly, as new codes are often released alongside updates and special events.

Star Trek Fleet Command: All Codes

As mentioned above, you will need plenty of resources to develop your empire, build new structures and ships, and even join an alliance. Some of them are extremely rare, and not all of them can be bought with currency, which will take quite a while to obtain. Using Star Trek Fleet Command codes, you can provide yourself with some of these resources quickly and for free.

Active Codes

  • Cadet - Redeem this code to get rewards
  • Warpspeed - Redeem this code to get rewards
  • TNG - Redeem this code to get rewards
  • Commander - Redeem this code to get rewards
  • Frontier - Redeem this code to get rewards
  • FleetCommand Boost - Redeem this code to get rewards
  • WOKPT1 - Redeem this code to get rewards
  • SECTION31 - Redeem this code to get rewards
  • Renegade - Redeem this code to get 5 Epic Tolra Shards and Starfleet Honors
  • Rogue - Redeem this code to get 5 Epic Tolra Shards and Syndicate Points
  • GQ7 - Redeem this code to get 2 Nesmith, 2 Laliari, 2 Alexander, and 125 MU Research Dust R5
  • GQ5 - Redeem this code to get 2 Nesmith, 2 Laliari, 2 Alexander, and 11,250 Loyalty Points
  • AlterEgo - Redeem this code to get 5 Mirror Kira Shards and 750 Section 31 Mirror Ciphers
  • Reflection - Redeem this code to get 5 Mirror Kira Shards
  • THEMIRROR - Redeem this code to get 5 Mirror Picard
  • EVISCERATOR - Redeem this code to get Exclusive rewards (To redeem this code, you need to reach Ops 10+)
  • ENT3 - Redeem this code to get Artifact Shards (To redeem this code, you need to reach Ops 38+)
  • NX-01 - Redeem this code to get Exclusive rewards (To redeem this code, you need to reach Ops 40+)
  • KIRK - Redeem this code to get Ultra Recruit Token x4000 and James T. Kirk shards x100

Expired Codes

  • WOKPT2
  • Crushers
  • BOLDLYGO
  • YOHP2
  • VOY30
  • YOH13
  • YOH7
  • MMAonpoint
  • Fw7hi45A
  • tD3vFAuS

Star Trek Fleet Command: How to Redeem Codes

Redeeming Star Trek Fleet Command codes is a bit difficult, as you can't do it directly in the game. Instead, you will need to register or log in to a Scopely account that is linked to your game profile. If you've already linked Scopely before, here's how to redeem the codes:

  • Launch the game.
  • Pay attention to the upper right part of the screen. There should be a button labeled Claim. Click on it.
  • This will open the Gifts menu with various options listed. Among them, find and interact with the one that says Redeem and the container image.
  • After doing so, you will be taken to the game's website, where you will need to log in with your Scopely account.
  • After authorization, you will eventually be taken directly to the code redemption page, where there will be an input field and a yellow Redeem button.
  • Now, choose one of the above active codes and enter it manually or copy and paste it into the input field.
  • Next, click the Redeem button to submit the request. If everything is successful, you will see a notification on the screen about the rewards you have received.
  • The last thing you need to do to collect them is to launch the game, wait for the download to complete, and then the rewards you received will be displayed on the screen.

It's worth noting that some players may experience an error when redeeming a code, even if they didn't make a mistake while typing the code, or if the code hasn't expired yet. The fact is that to get rewards from certain codes, you will first need to fulfill certain conditions, in this case, reach a certain Ops level. For some of the above codes, we have additionally written these conditions by level in parentheses, so if you have not met these requirements, you will not be able to receive rewards until you do.

Star Trek Fleet Command is available on PC, Android, and iOS.

item.title: Borderlands' Cutest Enemy Type Could Be More Valuable Than Ever in BL4
item.description:
Alongside the big swings Borderlands 4 is taking with its open-world, Gearbox is taking a step back and refining the series’ all-important loot system. Fresh mechanics like the boss rematch feature will make farming significantly easier, while the farming itself will be a necessity since Borderlands 4 will resemble the older games of the franchise in terms of its Legendary drops. Gone are the days of Borderlands 3 , where players expected to see a dozen Legendary drops in every single play session, as Gearbox is lowering the drop rate for its orange-colored guns considerably.

This back to basics approach to weaponry will make reliable sources of Legendary drops more valuable than ever. Raid boss farming will undoubtedly be a regular activity once again, while Golden Keys will be highly sought after, as early footage from content creator Ki11er Six has shown that the Golden Chest will still drop orange weapons often - at least in the beta build that was used for Borderlands 4 ’s previews. Alongside farming tough bosses and scouring the internet for Golden Key Shift codes, there will be more pressure to chase down the always-cute Chubby enemies whenever they appear, assuming that they will be returning in the new game.

Borderlands’ Chubby Enemies Have a Well-Earned Reputation

Like their names suggest, Chubby foes are small, huskier variants of existing Borderlands enemy types. Given their size and stature, nearly every Chubby (or Tubby, on higher difficulties) variant will have players fawning over their cuteness, but they can’t let themselves get distracted, as Chubbies will leave the map if they are not killed fast enough. Borderlands ’ Chubby enemy types thus far include:

  • Skags
  • Rakk
  • Spiderants
  • Varkids
  • Stalkers
  • Tinks
  • Skeletons

As for how these Borderlands foes got their cute looks, it’s actually due to eating weapons, class mods, shields, and any other loot they can get their hands on. When killed, players are guaranteed a Lootsplosion, making the prospect of gunning down something so adorable a much easier pill to swallow. On higher difficulties, gamers are practically guaranteed stellar loot from Chubbies and Tubbies, and even on Borderlands ’ base difficulty the loot is consistently solid. While it is currently unclear if Borderlands 4 is planning on bringing back the Chubby enemy type, fans could only hope that Gearbox will do so, as this variant would be more valuable than ever with drop rates being lowered so drastically.

How Borderlands 4 Could Make Chubbies Bigger Than Ever

Assuming that Chubbies do make a comeback in Borderlands 4 , they would be a welcome addition even if they were left exactly the same. However, Gearbox shouldn’t miss the chance to evolve its Chubby system, which could be done in a number of ways. One possibility would see Borderlands 4 letting players get more loot from Chubbies by shooting them in a specific location - perhaps anywhere but their bloated stomachs, as doing so could risk destroying some of the weapons held within. Another option would be a Chubby difficulty modifier, where their spawn rate is drastically increased, but each Chubby has a 50% chance to drop primed grenades instead of loot. Lastly, Borderlands 4 ’s mob density concerns could be proven meaningless via an incredibly rare multi-Chubby spawn, with dozens of Chubbies appearing at once and players needing to quickly pick their targets in all the chaos.

In addition to these ideas, Gearbox could always introduce more Chubby types, as Borderlands 4 ’s Timekeeper will undoubtedly have some fresh factions at his disposal that would make good candidates. Players have never fought a Chubby Guardian, Thresher, or Loader, with plenty of existing enemy types yet to get a rotund variant. Regardless of whether Borderlands 4 expands upon Chubbies or leaves them the exact same, hopefully they will return in some form, as it would be a joy to see how they’d look within Unreal Engine 5. For now, all fans can do is hope that they’ll stumble across these foes - and their guaranteed piles of rare loot - when the game launches in September.
